    User Pages were and are a reward gained from attaining Purple Belt as a TechNet Wiki Ninja.

    Many users have started their user page as a central Wiki article and community activity overview.

    If you have a User Page, tag it with "user page", and feel free to add your name in the list above and link to your user page.
